title: Nissan looks to rev up India operations; lines up product launches over next 30 months
description: The company, which is selling just one model in the country currently, is planning to drive in two mid-size SUV models (one five-seater and one seven-seater), one electric SUV and a refreshed version of its compact SUV Magnite.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
